DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine whether gadoxetate disodium ( Eovist ) enhance magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) high sensitivity detect hepatocellular carcinoma ( Liver Cancer ) comparison multi-detector compute tomography ( CT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Cirrhosis Malignant Hepatic Lesions Using Novel MR Contrast Agents
DOC.criteria: Alphafeto protein > 400 ng / mL prior ultrasound mass suspicious hepatic malignancy . clinical risk hepatocellular carcinoma prior multidetector CT mass suspicious possible hepatocellular carcinoma Glomerulofiltration rate < 50 mL/ min/1.73 m2 base creatinine measurement within three month MR study Previous diagnosis hepatic malignancy Any condition would discount ability MRI scan
